TikitButton.class: w-auto h-11 rounded-md bg-gray-500 ios:bg-selected-black/10 touch-feedback

Label.class: font-regular w-auto h-11 ml-2 mr-10 text-2xl text-center touch-enabled-false text-white/90

Icon.class: w-10 h-11 mr-0 text-2xl text-center touch-enabled-false text-white/90 fa fa-check-circle
